alert.note: Alert for Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 7:02PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN MONTGOMERY...SAN JACINTO...NORTHWESTERN LIBERTY...SOUTHWESTERN POLK...SOUTHEASTERN WALKER AND NORTH CENTRAL HARRIS COUNTIES THROUGH 730 PM CDT... At 702 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles west of Coldspring to near Cut And Shoot to near The Woodlands Pavillion. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Conroe, Humble, Tomball, Cleveland, Willis, Kingwood, The Woodlands, Spring, Oak Ridge North, Shepherd, Panorama Village, Shenandoah, Splendora, Patton Village, Roman Forest, Woodbranch, Cut And Shoot, Coldspring, Plum Grove, and North Cleveland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Harris; Montgomery; Northern Liberty; Polk; San Jacinto; Walker
